questions.question: 1. Which of the following is not an assumed parameter(s) in the Viterbi algorithm ?
2. What is the role of the Forward Algorithm in an HMM?

answers.a: Finding the most probable hidden state sequence
answers.b: Training the HMM using maximum likelihood estimation
answers.c: Compute the probability of an observed sequence given in the model

questions.question: 3. Identify the commonly used algorithm for training HMMs.

answers.a: The probability of transitioning from one state to another
answers.b: The probability of starting in a particular state
answers.c: The probability of observing a particular output given a hidden state
answers.d: The probability of the most likely sequence of states
